document.full_text: to keep the deal from collapsing, bp must persuade rosneft to extend the deadline or find a compromise with the billionaire shareholders in its existing russia venture.
document.title: bp scrambles to salvage rosneft deal as deadline nears
lines_and_colors: to keep the deal from collapsing, bp must persuade rosneft to extend the deadline or find a compromise with the billionaire shareholders in its existing russia venture.
